sqlMap.select: SELECT PID ,F_GET_COMBO_NAME('STATUS_CD',PID_STATUS_CD) AS PID_STATUS_NM ,F_GET_COMBO_NAME('CATEGORY_CD',RD_CATEGORY_CD) AS RD_CATEGORY_NM ,RD_THEME ,ITEM_NAME ,NICKNAME ,NICKNAME_EXCL ,RD_CATEGORY_CD ,REGIST_ORG_CD ,OWNER_ORG_CD FROM HP1DM01T WHERE 1=1 AND PID=#PID#
SELECT 'P'|| LPAD(PID_SUBPID_SEQ.nextval,5,'0') AS PID , PID_SUBPID_SEQ.CURRVAL AS CNT FROM DUAL
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP1DM01T (REGIST_ORG_CD, OWNER_COMPANY_CD, PID, REGIST_COMPANY_CD, PID_STATUS_CD, APPLICATION, RD_THEME, NICKNAME, RD_CATEGORY_TYPE, REGIST_TIME, RD_CATEGORY_CD, REGIST_USER_ID, ITEM_NAME, OWNER_ORG_CD, NICKNAME_EXCL) values(#REGIST_ORG_CD# , #OWNER_COMPANY_CD# , #PID# , #REGIST_COMPANY_CD# , #PID_STATUS_CD# , #APPLICATION# , #RD_THEME# , #NICKNAME# , #RD_CATEGORY_TYPE# , SYSDATE, #RD_CATEGORY_CD# , #REGIST_USER_ID# , #ITEM_NAME# , #OWNER_ORG_CD# , #NICKNAME_EXCL# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT PID ,F_GET_COMBO_NAME('STATUS_CD',PID_STATUS_CD) AS PID_STATUS_NM ,F_GET_COMBO_NAME('CATEGORY_CD',RD_CATEGORY_CD) AS RD_CATEGORY_NM ,RD_THEME ,ITEM_NAME ,NICKNAME ,NICKNAME_EXCL ,RD_CATEGORY_CD ,REGIST_ORG_CD ,OWNER_ORG_CD FROM HP1DM01T WHERE 1=1 AND PID=#PID#
SELECT ORG_CD AS ITEM_CD ,ORG_NM_S AS ITEM_NM FROM HP1DM03T WHERE 1=1 AND ORG_LVL != '1' AND ACTIVE_FLAG= 0 AND COMPANY_CD=#COMPANY_CD# ORDER BY ORG_SEQ
